name: Demon in a Jar
description:
You’re a young Wizard’s assistant. One night a demon trapped by your Master asks you to set him free and makes you a tempting offer that’s hard to resist...

This is a short and funny story-based game full of irony, made specifically for #MyFirstGameJam Summer 2021 themed “free”.

THE GAME IS IN PROGRESS! Stay tuned for further updates 

Please note that English is not my native language, so if you spot any mistakes feel free to reach me via comments.

All your feedback is much appreciated! :)
